summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 75th Street, from Bothell Way to 12th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93465 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
